item.title: GCP VM Migration
item.description: How to migrate a VM between GCP projects Have you ever had a sever that was not created via automated processes and needed to move that VM to another project in GCP? Searching the internet will lead you down all sort of rabbit holes on the old way of doing things. They all seem to point at spinning up a new server, cloning the disk via dd and them creating the new VM fom that disk image.
